TransactionId.description: Unique identifier of the recall payment as assigned by ClearBank.

OriginalTransactionId.description: Unique identifier of the original payment transaction, as assigned by ClearBank, to unambiguously identify the transaction. This identifier is passed on, unchanged, throughout the entire end-to-end chain.

TimestampCancelled.description: Date and time transaction was cancelled, in UTC.

CancellationReason.description: Reason Instant SEPA recall payment was cancelled.
